abilities.name: Unholy Bloodshed
abilities.rule: Once per battle, when this unit makes a Dark Pact, until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in this unit have the **[DEVASTATING WOUNDS]** ability.

abilities.name: Chaos Icon
abilities.rule: Each time the bearer’s unit takes a Leadership test for the Dark Pacts ability, you can re-roll that test.

wargear_abilities.name: Chaos Icon
wargear_abilities.rule: Each time the bearer’s unit takes a Leadership test for the Dark Pacts ability, you can re-roll that test.

wargear_options: ■ 1 model can be equipped with 1 Chaos icon.
